overview: The tawdry story continues…as women seduce other women, make love to them and leave them for others.  In the first scene of Lesbian Triangles 22, Jodi catches Prinzzess breaking some of her house rules. What begins as a good tongue lashing turns into a hot tongue licking as Jodi mounts Prinzzess. Brandi brings some food over to her neighbor Jodi in the next scene, only to find the seductive Bibette answering the door instead. Bibette invites Brandi inside the house and then inside herself. Diamond and Janet tear off each other’s clothes in the movie’s third tryst, while Jodi seduces Sadie, one of Prinzzess’ friends in the movies’ orgasmic finale.
tagline: Over 2 Hours Of Cheating Romance And Seduction
title: Lesbian Triangles 22
